add_to_cart.prompt: I can add {quantity} x item {identifier} to your cart. Would you like me to proceed?
add_to_cart.prompt_generic: I can add an item to your cart. Would you like me to proceed?

set_item_quantity.prompt: I can set the quantity of product {productId} to {quantity} in your cart. Would you like me to proceed?
set_item_quantity.prompt_generic: I can update the quantity of an item in your cart. Would you like me to proceed?

remove_item.prompt: I can remove product {productId} from your cart. Would you like me to proceed?
remove_item.prompt_generic: I can remove an item from your cart. Would you like me to proceed?

generic.prompt: I need your confirmation to proceed with this cart action. Would you like me to proceed?

confirm.cancelled: Okay, I've cancelled the action. Is there anything else I can help you with?
confirm.already_completed: This action has already been completed. Is there anything else I can help you with?
confirm.already_cancelled: This action has already been cancelled. Is there anything else I can help you with?
